Question: Advance Solution Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Advance Solution Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree

- Product: AirJet®Mini – Solid-State Active Cooling Chip for Electronic Devices
- Product Category: Embedded Technologies
- Features: Solid-state active cooling chip, innovation in embedded technologies

- Product: AVEIR™ Dual chamber (DR) Leadless Pacemaker System
- Product Category: Digital Health
- Features: Dual chamber leadless pacemaker system for digital health

- Product: HP Spectre Fold
- Product Category: Computer Hardware & Components
- Features: Innovative foldable design, computer hardware and components

- Product: JBL Live 3 Earbuds
- Product Category: Headphones & Personal Audio
- Features: World-class audio, active noise-cancellation, charging case with LED touchscreen display

- Product: Panasonic Shelf Speaker System (SC-PM270)
- Product Category: Home Audio
- Features: Bluetooth-enabled, 20 watts stereo power, radio, and CD player

- Product: Garmin Epix Pro
- Product Category: Smartwatches
- Features: Second generation fitness and adventure smartwatch, AMOLED touchscreen display
Summary_cn:
先进解决方案有限公司。

2024年CES创新奖荣誉奖

- 产品：AirJet®Mini – 用于电子设备的固态主动冷却芯片
- 产品类别：嵌入式技术
- 特点：固态主动冷却芯片，嵌入式技术的创新

- 产品：AVEIR™ 双腔（DR）无引线起搏器系统
- 产品类别：数字医疗
- 特点：数字医疗的双腔无引线起搏器系统

- 产品：HP Spectre Fold
- 产品类别：计算机硬件和组件
- 特点：创新的可折叠设计，计算机硬件和组件

- 产品：JBL Live 3 Earbuds
- 产品类别：耳机和个人音频
- 特点：世界级音质、主动降噪、带有LED触摸屏显示的充电盒

- 产品：松下架上式扬声器系统 (SC-PM270)
- 产品类别：家庭音响
- 特点：蓝牙功能、20瓦立体声功率、收音机和CD播放器

- 产品：Garmin Epix Pro
- 产品类别：智能手表
- 特点：第二代健身和探险智能手表，AMOLED触摸屏显示
